divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in the garden,my son just called me on my cellphone, had a short conversation and hung up. turned to go into the house and looked up at the stars as i always do outside and a flash caught my eye, my first reaction was to call my wife, but i was awestruck watching it, the first thing i did was line the light up with my finger and a star so i could see if the travel was straight or erratic. it seemed to wobble in a straight line. i waited for any engine noise and there was none. it was now traveleing in an easterly direction and seemed to slow down over C.F.B. Comox..and then it just disapeared! My son told me he saw the same light. he was 6 blocks south of me when he saw the same thing. i knew at the time i was watching a U.F.O. its not the first i have seen and i know it wont be my last! thanks for your website B.W.Broere
Summary: a bright star like object came from the north-west and traveled overhead ab out a mile up and proceeded in an easterly directi on...appeared to slow down over C.F.B. Comox and disapeared
